{"blocks":[{"key":"dc50q","text":"In male mice, also monitor genitals, since penis prolapse (paraphimosis) and uretral plugs (obstructive uropathy) are usual complications. If there is an urethral plug, apply a lubricant (e.g. oftalmic ointment, mineral oil) and local analgesic cream if needed and try to remove it. Then use a lubricated stainless-steel probe to reinsert the penis into the prepuce if possible, or leave the penis lubricated and check for spontaneous resolution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3m64","text":"Remove feces/urine on the beam, if any, while the mouse is in the goal box.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fuknv","text":"Repeat 14.2 step three more times by taking the mouse out of the goal box and then placing it at:","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ekte7","text":"12 inches from the goal box","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"esdqa","text":"In the middle of the beam","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"o23k","text":"At the far end of the beam","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b2om1","text":"Allow the mouse to stay inside the goal box for   each time.   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":48,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fdoro","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":30,"guid":"C18B64713EC111EEB0D10A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fv74k","text":"After a mouse completes the training, if another mouse from the same home cage is going to be trained, keep that same home cage bedding in goal box and just remove feces/urine on the beam.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f33p4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"222q3","text":"When all mice from a given home cage were trained, clean the beam/goal box with 70% ethanol, and remove the bedding. Replace with bedding from the home cage of the following mice to train.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1pj6o","text":"After all mice complete the training, clean the beam/goal box with 70% ethanol, and remove the bedding.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9hul3","text":"Testing: Day 2","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3f477","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"madd","text":"Setup is the same as day 1, but all different sized beams are used (19 mm, 12 mm and 6 mm). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":32,"length":59}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7lkrm","text":"Wipe down beams and goal box with 70% ethanol prior to start.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fau5","text":"Start recording the video with the camera.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c5mpf","text":"Place a mouse on the 19 mm beam (large sized beam) at the farthest position from the goal box. Make sure the mouse is facing the goal box and is well-balanced before you release its tail. Encourage the mouse to move along the beam if it does not do so on its own after a few seconds, but just until it reaches the first marker. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dq13g","text":"The mouse must cross the 80 cm distance between the two markers on the beam in less than   . The maximal score for latency to cross the beam is 60s and it is considered an unsuccessful trial.     ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":89,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"97c9i","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":60,"guid":"68948F7D3ECE11EEB0D10A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c9csp","text":"Once crossed the beam and reached the goal box, leave the mouse inside for   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":75,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8rskf","text":"If it the maximal score 60s was reached, gently grab the mouse from the beam and place it on the goal box also for   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":116,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":30,"guid":"C18B64713EC111EEB0D10A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":30,"guid":"C18B64713EC111EEB0D10A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cp8it","text":"Repeat the trial with same beam. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2c6k4","text":"Repeat steps 11.2 to 11.4 with the 12mm (medium) and 6mm (small) beams, going from largest to smallest, for a total of 6 trials per mouse (2 trials per beam size).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"nm87","text":"Once finished testing one mouse, clean the beam/goal box with 70% ethanol, and replace the bedding (for mice from the same home cage it is not necessary to clean and change the bedding, just clean excess of urine or feces that can be on the beam).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"68hhm","text":"After all mice complete the test, stop video recording, clean the beam/goal box with 70% ethanol, and discard the bedding.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6f1om","text":"Post-hoc analysis:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5si1d","text":"The following data is expressed as the average of the two trials per beam size","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fbjat","text":"Latency to cross the beam: corresponds to the latencty to walk the 80cm between the two markers in each beam, with a maximum score of 60 seconds (unsuccessful trial).","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7kevk","text":"Number of hind foot slips made along the way (If the trial is unsuccessful because the mouse remains immobile for most of the time and not engaged in the walking task, do not include the number of slips for the average).","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"85aqj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"21tda","text":"Set up behavior room:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7j33h","text":"Clean each lane of the RotaRod with 70% ethanol.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d8p0t","text":"Cut paper towels to the size of lanes and place them there for ease of cleaning.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"efepf","text":"Turn on RotaRod and corresponding 'RotaRod' software (mouse logo). Select the appropriate protocol. Hit 'Browse' option to navigate to your folder and create a file for the first group of mice to be tested (remember to create a new file for each group of mice).","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6biek","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8p6nn","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"eija1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4h3a0","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"febd5","text":"Make sure nothing is blocking lane photobeams and push “Reset” buttons on rotarod, so each lane light is off (in the software, lanes will change from red to green. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":72}],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":42,"offset":0,"style":"italic"}],"key":"4jbqs","text":"6-OHDA mouse model of Parkinson's disease: accelerated from 3-30 rpm in    (300s), 1 day test, three trials.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4kgd1","text":"","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"duration":300,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"duration"}}}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4rihl","text":"This RotaRod model has 5 lanes. Test mice from same cage together. ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"ae0k9","text":"If you have mice from more than one cage going at once, leave at least one\nempty lane between mice from different cages so you have some buffer lane if they\nwander into the next lane before you catch them. ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7ea6e","text":"Even if you are testing mice from the same cage, a buffer lane is always preferred when possible (\u003c5 mice). ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4rood","text":"Habituation:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2bn20","text":"Bring mice to the behavior room in their home cages and leave undisturbed for at least 30-40 minutes.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6s03p","text":"Testing: basic procedure for 1 day, 3 trials","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3rhhl","text":"Place mouse on the immobile rod, holding its tail for a few seconds to make sure it will not jump and to let it get its balance.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fp9pl","text":"Wait   before starting rotation (first trial only).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":5,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"42jmu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":30,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2v52o","text":"Hit 'Reset' button on software. Rod starts moving at 3 rpm (initial speed).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4ibod","text":"Then immediately press “On/Accel” button: acceleration program begins and automatically starts the time counting for each lane.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fd1ql","text":"Remove the mouse if it falls (the photobem detection automatically stop the timer for that lane) or if continuous passive rotations occur (entire rotation of mouse body around the rod, with mouse holding on at one spot and riding around more than one rotation, without active intention to re-orient and continue walking forward). If passive rotations occurs, trip photobeam with your hand to stop the timer for that lane and then remove the mouse.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2ouus","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8dhs7","text":"Although latency to fall (and the speed) will be automatically recorded and saved by the software, it is recommended to annotate it in real-time. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dtmum","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"88r9s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"b2j9u","text":"Additional notes can be recorded regarding number of single rotations around the rod before re-engaging in walking or re-orienting. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"28av","text":"Place removed mice into their home cages. Trial ends when all mice are collected. If any mice complete the 5 min (300 sec) program, stop the rotarod, remove the mice and give them the maximum score of 300 sec/30 rpm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"77jji","text":"Clean rotarod (feces/urine) and replace paper towels if necessary (optional between trials for the same group of mice).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9qov6","text":"Let mice rest in their home cages for   between trials.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":38,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2fkra","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bfhpt","text":"Repeat steps from 9.1 to 9.8 for trials 2 and 3, except for step 9.2 (start the accelerated program immediately after placing mice on the rotarod, without 30 s of delay).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4pbor","text":"Once all three trials for a group of mice are finished, clean each lane of the rotaod with 70% ethanol, replace paper towels, and create a new file for the following group of mice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7ogb","text":"Run again the previously described three trials per group of mice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9dksc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dh6db","text":"Analysis: latency to fall or time to reach maximum speed is recorded for the three trials and the average of the two best trials is reported.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5rmbg","text":"Required materials:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"clbrn","text":"Open field chamber: 50 cm x 50 cm square box.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5411p","text":"Overhead mounted camera.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"47f79","text":"Video analysis software.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ombc","text":"70% ethanol.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3f14o","text":"Set up behavior room:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b4uuv","text":"Set up lighting minimizing total room light, reducing shadows within the chamber, and ensuring camera is able to detect the mice.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dqscu","text":"Clean chamber with 70% ethanol.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cnk7d","text":"Place chamber under camera.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"be5in","text":"Turn on camera, adjust zoom and focus.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4g1n1","text":"Habituation:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"l2bo","text":"Bring mice to the behavior room in their home cages and leave undisturbed for at least 30-40 minutes.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"es19s","text":"No previous habituation to the open field arena is required.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9pdkq","text":"Testing:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"830jg","text":"Start recording video before the mouse is in the chamber to collect the background images or just save a background image before starting the video. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9kso0","text":"Place mouse in chamber.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bck8b","text":"Record video for the desired length of time (e.g.   ).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":50,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4hj0n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"91j3t","text":"Remove mouse from chamber and return it to home cage.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"67aoh","text":"Clean the chamber between mice with 70% ethanol and allow to fully dry before starting another trial. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dpm1d","text":"Post-hoc analysis:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e2f5v","text":"Run tracking EthoVision software to calculate the desired measures (e.g. total distance traveled, velocity, etc.).","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"75a6q","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4v62g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2j3qb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"btm9g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"equipment","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"brand":"Noldus","can_edit":1,"file":{"icon":"","id":null,"name":"","source":""},"guid":"452C6D07341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","image":{"icon":"","id":null,"name":"","source":""},"link":"https://www.noldus.com/ethovision-xt","name":"EthoVision","sku":"RRID:SCR_000441","specifications":"RRID:SCR_000441","type":"Software","vendor":{"id":800,"image":{"placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"https://www.noldus.com","name":"Noldus Information Technology"}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cb5md","text":"Start daily intraperitoneal (i.p.) injections of 2.0 mg/kg of L-DOPA (3,4-dihydroxy-L-phenylalanine) plus 12 mg/kg of benserazide hydrochloride dissolved in sterile saline for 7-8 days.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5h44p","text":"Behavioral motor tests (open field and dyskinesia) are formally conducted in different days at the end of the treatment (days 7 and 8).","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"343bm","text":"Acute brain slices for electrophysiology recordings must be prepared 30min – 1 h after the last L-DOPA administration, while mice are still in the dyskinetic period.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dvsnh","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"49dt8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"result","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":124},{"key":1,"length":1,"offset":159}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"5ci9o","text":"Contralesional rotations and levodopa-induced dyskinesia (LID) abnormal involuntary movements (AIMs) typically begin within   of injection, last approximately  , and terminate spontaneously.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"duration":600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"duration"},"1":{"data":{"duration":7200,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"duration"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ec46v","text":"Set up behavior room:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9n7im","text":"Place up to four clear plastic cylinders (25.4 cm diameter; 30.5 cm height) with a mat below and an overhead mounted camera (organized in two rows 2x2).","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b16f7","text":"Set up lighting minimizing total room light, reducing shadows within the chamber, and ensuring camera is able to detect the mice.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bddff","text":"Clean each cylinder with 70% ethanol.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ak46k","text":"Turn on camera, adjust zoom and focus.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"54mmc","text":"Capture a background video or image before placing the mice in the cylinders.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2loop","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ls","text":"Habituation:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dmv76","text":"Bring mice to the behavior room in their home cages and leave undisturbed for at least 30-40 minutes.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fkusm","text":"No previous habituation to the open field arena is required.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9hlia","text":"Post-hoc analysis:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2qt2e","text":"Run tracking EthoVision software to calculate the following parameters:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2qdvu","text":"Total distance traveled.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8u29k","text":"Mean velocity.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6vr7h","text":"Rotations (threshold: 90-180°, minimum distance traveled: 2 cm).","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"etr4i","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"467vf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"equipment","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"brand":"Noldus","can_edit":1,"file":{"icon":"","id":null,"name":"","source":""},"guid":"452C6D07341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","image":{"icon":"","id":null,"name":"","source":""},"link":"https://www.noldus.com/ethovision-xt","name":"EthoVision","sku":"RRID:SCR_000441","specifications":"RRID:SCR_000441","type":"Software","vendor":{"id":800,"image":{"placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"https://www.noldus.com","name":"Noldus Information Technology"}}}}}
